solution_line_template: Before washing the car Fred had ${final_amount} - ${car_wash_earnings} = $<<{final_amount}-{car_wash_earnings}={before_car_wash}>>{before_car_wash}.
Fred spent half his allowance for the movies, so {multiplier_for_half} * ${before_car_wash} = $<<{multiplier_for_half}*{before_car_wash}={allowance}>>{allowance} allowance.
